Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Kedzie-Homan. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Kedzie-Homan.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #51 51st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 51st/Sacramento.
ShortDescription: Westbound #51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, California, 47th, Kedzie, due to a street blockage near 51st/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, California, 47th, Kedzie, then resume their normal route on 51st, due to a street blockage near 51st/Sacramento.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
